name: Euro Oil Tanker Driving Sim
description:
Euro Oil Tanker Driving Sim is a driving game in which oil tanker is attached. The main objective of this game is to transport refined oil, high flammable gasoline safely to offroad gas station. Provide oil cargo transport to army base and and avoid heavy traffic accidents on the roads. Run Offroad heavy 4x4 truck trailer and fulfill the needs of the city.

Features
Easy to play
Realistic HD graphics and HD truck sound
Multiple attractive levels
Off-road impossible tracks
Heavy duty oil tankers driving experience
Realistic gameplay control
Heavy transport duty
